text:
As mentioned in previous posts <@U04H03C0QP7> - self promotion isn’t allowed in this Slack unless you’re looking for or posting a HubSpot job in <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> or showing off something you built on HubSpot in <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase>, as indicated in our code of conduct: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct|https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct>
 If we find you posting promotions again, we may need to consider removing you from this slack. Please let me know if you have any questions.
